Package acrobot

See Sutton and Barto page 270 for a description.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Acrobot See Sutton and Barto page 270 for a description.
AcrobotCLS2 An attempt to implement the CLSquare version of the acrobot described in Sutton and Barto page 270 The main modification is the rewriting of the successorState method...
AcrobotCLS2Tiling An attempt to implement the CLSquare version of the acrobot described in Sutton and Barto page 270 with tiles
AcrobotCLS2TilingSimple An attempt to implement the CLSquare version of the acrobot described in Sutton and Barto page 270 with a more simple tile coding (n 4-dimensionnal tilings)
AcrobotDesign  
AcrobotState As in Sutton and Barto, Acrobot states are defined by two angles and two speeds.
ActionAcrobot Acrobot can only exert positive, negative or null torque.
 

Package acrobot Description

See Sutton and Barto page 270 for a description. All the settings are (quite) strictly following this definition.
